Text: Energy Markets Special Subscription OfferDear Lindy CurrierDonoho RESERVE YOUR OWN FREE SUBSCRIPTION TO ENERGY MARKETS Each issue contains valuable worldwide coverage of the global integrated energy industry with monthly features and sections on Deregulation Power Technology Finance Capital Business Opportunities CIS CRM Billing Metering Reliable information and worldwide analysis all in one monthly magazine ENERGY MARKETS is the magazine of choice for busy power and gas professionals such as yourself And if you act today you can qualify for a FREE SUBSCRIPTION To activate your FREE subscription simply click the following url cgibinsubscribeekpkEGAS or visit and select SUBSCRIBE NOTE To be removed from future solicitations please click REPLY type the word REMOVE on the subject line and click SEND To remove yourself from future broadcasts but activate a subscription click the above link and omit your email address on your application FREE Subscriptions subject to publisher approval Only a limited number of FREE subscriptions are made available each year to industry professionals meeting specific demographics Your submittal does NOT obligate you or your company in any way Should your demographic category reach capacity you will be notified and offered the opportunity to instead purchase a paid subscription EGAS
